pullrequest.title: Add countdown feature to common::Timer, expose countdown to TimerGUIPlugin

content.raw:
I created #1626 to track the OS X problems, and I suggest the following patch to disable the test for OS X:

~~~
diff -r 7878b71b3db2 gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt	Tue Jun 02 16:20:46 2015 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt	Tue Jun 02 17:43:35 2015 -0700
@@ -138,9 +138,17 @@
   SystemPaths_TEST.cc
   SVGLoader_TEST.cc
   Time_TEST.cc
-  Timer_TEST.cc
 )
 
+# Timer test fails on OSX
+# See issue #1626
+if (NOT APPLE)
+  set (gtest_sources
+    ${gtest_sources}
+    Timer_TEST.cc
+  )
+endif()
+
 if (HAVE_GTS)
 set (sources
   ${sources}
~~~
